## New Verb Set

**Set name:** <!-- e.g. coffee-shop -->
**Language:** <!-- e.g. en -->

### Checklist

- [ ] File is in `sets/<lang>/` using an ISO 639-1 language code
- [ ] Filename matches the `name` field in the JSON
- [ ] `github` field is set to your GitHub username
- [ ] Passes schema validation (`bun src/validate-sets.ts`)
- [ ] Contains 30â€“50 verbs
- [ ] No duplicate verbs
- [ ] Verbs are thematically consistent
- [ ] Tests pass (`bun run test`)
